other_tests.findings: Minimal bibasilar atelectasis; innumerable hypodensities in the liver consistent with cysts; new cystic structure in the pancreatic tail; intermediate density lesion in the lower pole of the left kidney; thickening of the sigmoid colon with fat stranding surrounding multiple diverticuli.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The cystic structure in the pancreatic tail appears new from the prior exam.
